Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 4 wickets for 22 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 32 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma was named Player of the Match
England remains at the bottom of the points table
Others: India stays unbeaten with six wins in as many games
England still has a chance to qualify for the semi-finals
